LinkItem.internal_link_text: Support for Linux images in Microsoft Azure
Support for Linux images in Microsoft Azure

MarkdownBlockBase.code_block: "The VHD http://<mystorageaccount>.blob.core.windows.net/vhds/MyLinuxVM.vhd has an unsupported virtual size of 21475270656 bytes. The size must be a whole number (in MBs).”

MarkdownCodeBlock.code_block: # qemu-img convert -f vpc -O raw MyLinuxVM.vhd MyLinuxVM.raw

rawdisk="MyLinuxVM.raw" vhddisk="MyLinuxVM.vhd"
MB=$((1024*1024)) size=$(qemu-img info -f raw --output json "$rawdisk" | \ gawk 'match($0, /"virtual-size": ([0-9]+),/, val) {print val[1]}')
rounded_size=$((($size/$MB + 1)*$MB)) echo "Rounded Size = $rounded_size"
# qemu-img convert -f raw -o subformat=fixed -O vpc MyLinuxVM.raw MyLinuxVM.vhd

MarkdownBlockBase.code_block: F: arch/x86/include/asm/mshyperv.h F: arch/x86/include/uapi/asm/hyperv.h F: arch/x86/kernel/cpu/mshyperv.c F: drivers/hid/hid-hyperv.c F: drivers/hv/ F: drivers/input/serio/hyperv-keyboard.c F: drivers/net/hyperv/ F: drivers/scsi/storvsc_drv.c F: drivers/video/fbdev/hyperv_fb.c F: include/linux/hyperv.h F: tools/hv/

LinkItem.internal_link_text: ata_piix: defer disks to the Hyper-V drivers by default
ata_piix: defer disks to the Hyper-V drivers by default
storvsc: Account for in-transit packets in the RESET path
storvsc: Account for in-transit packets in the RESET path
storvsc: Disable WRITE SAME for RAID and virtual host adapter drivers
storvsc: Disable WRITE SAME for RAID and virtual host adapter drivers
storvsc: ring buffer failures may result in I/O freeze
storvsc: ring buffer failures may result in I/O freeze

MarkdownCodeBlock.code_block: ResourceDisk.Format=y ResourceDisk.Filesystem=ext4 ResourceDisk.MountPoint=/mnt/resource ResourceDisk.EnableSwap=y ResourceDisk.SwapSizeMB=2048 ## NOTE: set this to whatever you need it to be.
